dict.acceptation: （表示论及）关于；（表示过程）忙于；（表示对象）对；（表示原因）由于；
大约；在附近；在四周；几乎；
在附近的；四处走动的；在起作用的；

sent.orig: Don't worry about not knowing much about the goods; just compare and you will see which is better.; Don't fear it won't be appreciated; it stands up well to comparison.
sent.trans: 不怕不识货，就怕货比货。

sent.orig: Don't worry about not knowing much about the goods; just compare and you will see which is better.
sent.trans: 不怕不识货，就怕货比货。

sent.orig: He bitched about the service, then bitched about the bill.
sent.trans: 他埋怨服务不周到，后来又埋怨要钱太多。

sent.orig: Mr. White had a bad cold about a week ago, and he is out and about this morning.
sent.trans: 怀特先生一星期前患了重感冒，今天早晨能出来走走了。

sent.orig: The next I'd like to talk about is about agriculture.
sent.trans: 下面我要谈的是关于农业问题。
